This game is working. It isn't working for you because you aren't copying the cracked info or mounting the .iso correctly. This works perfectly, only because I know what I am doing. Installing it and playing it all at once won't work, it will just screw up the game.

If you are using PowerIso and you see the list of items in the .iso, then click setup.exe, you are doing it all wrong. If you don't mount, it won't work. If you don't mount, it will ask you for an activation code to install (ex1stenZ and much more).
